description:
The beauty of a soft bottle lies in the fact that, once empty, it compacts smaller than most water bottles. The opening is a standard size, so the Seeker 6L works with other lids. The included plug-and-play (PNP) lid and Camp Tap nozzle allow controlled pouring, great for refilling bottles or doing the dishes. Ideal for carrying extra water on a hike, paddling tour, road trip or anywhere else you need water and carry space is limited.

  • Camp tap makes precise pouring and flow control easy
  • Soft, grip-able TPU is RF welded to create leakproof bonds
  • BPA-free, PVC-free and meets or exceeds FDA and EU regulations
  • Multiple lash points make it easy to attach to a pack, kayak deck, or nearly anywhere else you need it
  • Soft bail handle is comfy to carry and doubles as a retention loop when the bottle is rolled up
  • Internal baffles create some structure, and also give you something to hold onto
  • Works with HydraPak’s PNP accessories and inline filter (not included)
  • 42mm cap allows you to drink and pour with ease
  • Can be frozen or filled with warm water (max temp 60°C)
  • Dimensions: 44 x 18.5cm
name: Hydrapak Seeker 6L Water Container
